title: E-Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Gamified Collaborative Learning Course in Neuroanatomy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic life sciences and human anatomy
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real clinical cases using higher-order thinking skills (HOTS) at Bloom’s cognitive domain classification level 3 or above
Learners can explain the associations between neuroanatomical structures and functions with over 80% accuracy through gamified quiz activities
Learners can generate neuroanatomy-related problem-solving strategies more than three times through peer assessment feedback on collaborative learning platforms
Learners can perform appropriate anatomical judgments over 70% of the time in virtual simulations utilizing daily-life cases (e.g., stroke, head trauma)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
